title: ISic001877. Fragment of an imperial honorific
body:
Facsimile Images

------
p(ontifici) m(aximo) res publica Tindari-
tanorum devota numini
maiestatique eius

Apparatus criticus

Text of Giardina/CIL/Fasolo; As CIL observes, the lack of indication of a break on the stone prior to line 1 in Giardina's original report should be ignored, as it is clear that the bulk of the dedication is missing.

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • Giardina 1882 161
  • 10.8420 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Fasolo 2013 80 no. 20 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002011
